name: postgis
desc: Adds support for geographic objects to PostgreSQL

options.description: Build shp2pgsql-gui in addition to command line tools
Build with protobuf-c to enable Geobuf and Mapbox Vector Tile support

caveats:
To create a spatially-enabled database, see the documentation:
  https://postgis.net/docs/manual-2.4/postgis_installation.html#create_new_db_extensions
If you are currently using PostGIS 2.0+, you can go the soft upgrade path:
  ALTER EXTENSION postgis UPDATE TO "2.5.0";
Users of 1.5 and below will need to go the hard-upgrade path, see here:
  https://postgis.net/docs/manual-2.4/postgis_installation.html#upgrading

PostGIS SQL scripts installed to:
  /home/travis/Homebrew/opt/postgis/share/postgis
PostGIS plugin libraries installed to:
  /home/travis/Homebrew/lib
PostGIS extension modules installed to:
  /home/travis/Homebrew/share/postgresql/extension
